description_html:
New Mensolinea System:
Mensolinea shelf is the ideal solution for fitting out the space between base and wall units. In aluminium with stainless steel finish it is made-to-measure, fitted with a continual tray along the upper part and Schuko sockets.
New black anodised Mensolinea shelf with equipped back panel and accessories in wood and New Shelf Lighting Unit, 8.3 cm tall, with integrated hood and new open shelves in wood, h 36 cm. Available wood: Walnut colour, Teak, Fumé Oak, Fossil Oak.

The New Mensolinea project has been presented for the first time in September 2017 in the new Arclinea Store in Brompton Road, London, inside the prestigious B&B Italia store: a space that confirms the strategic partnership launched between the two companies one year ago, founded on their shared values of design, innovation and quality.
The idea behind the London project focuses on an overall image of Arclinea in which nature of the design is accompanied by style choices with great personality. This is the tangible result of a Collection, coordinated by Antonio Citterio, company’s main designer since 1986, whereby innovative product 'concepts' bring together distinctive and cross-cutting functional elements in the project, by way of an aesthetically high-impact architectural construction, all aimed at a logic of ‘tailor-made’.
